/** * viewGrid component, requires API with array of data or object with 'records' array of data. */ app.config([ 'formioComponentsProvider', function(formioComponentsProvider) { formioComponentsProvider.register('viewgrid', { fbtemplate: 'formio/formbuilder/viewgrids.html', title: 'ViewGrid', template: 'formio/components/viewgrids.html', group: 'advanced', icon: 'fa fa-table', settings: { multiple: true, input: false, key: 'viewgridField', label: '', protected: false, unique: false, persistent: true, showTitle: false, viewgridData: { dataDisplayObject: [], dataInputObject: [], dataOutputObject: [] } }, views: [ { name: 'ViewGrid', template: 'formio/components/common/viewgrid.html' } ], documentation: '' }); } ]);
